Hey guys it's Ace\_Of\_Spaces here I'm thinking of making a World War K/Macey's Dreams type series. It would be a basically be a series of wars starting with WW1 or WW2 and working up until all out interplanetary conflict. 

any thoughts, feedback, and suggestions would be appreciated(Recording software would help a bunch).

As for the recording software, I recommed OBS. It's free, easy to use and can be used for both streaming and/or saving video to a file. I use it in all my yt projects. 

BahamutoD CameraTools mod is great for making nice shots in KSP. In his other mod, BahamutoD Armory, you will find weapons and for making oldstyle war machines KEX/Firespitter combo can be of help. There is also one mod with additional tank turrets (e.g. Challenger), but sadly I don't remember the name.
Does anyone have any ideas for the villain(s)' name?

> 
> Does anyone have any ideas for the villain(s)' name?

MechJeb. That way, it ties into half the KSP war videos ever made.
